show.title: Ranching Reboot
show.summary: Rebooting your thinking about Farming, Ranching and Food production. Conversations in land stewardship with some of today's most innovative ranchers and producers. Support this podcast: https://anchor.fm/ranching-reboot/support

title: #21 Joe Tomandl " Disrupting the Dairy industry"
subtitle: #21 Joe Tomandl " Disrupting the Dairy industry"
summary:
This week we are joined by Joe Tomandl from the Dairy Grazing Apprenticeship program.

We keep getting requests, questions and guest suggestions for the more dairy content, so we are going to keep delivering!

www.dga-national.org
